flawed_nl_solution:
In the first week, Jed has 20 + 6 = <<20+6=26>>26 cards.
In the second week, he has 26 + 6 = <<26+6=32>>32 cards.
But he is left with 32 - 2 = <<32-2=26>>26 cards on the 2nd week after giving 2 cards to his friend.
Then Jed has 26 + 6 = <<26+6=32>>32 cards on the 3rd week.
He has 32 + 6 = <<32+6=38>>38 cards on the 4th week.
After giving his friend 2 cards, he is then left with 38 - 2 = <<38-2=36>>36 cards on the 4th week.
